body_html:
Sorry @kwotsin . I don't know what those errors are about. I usually build like this:

  $ git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow 
  $ cd tensorflow
  $ ./configure
  $ bazel build tensorflow/tools/graph_transforms:all

I just tried them.
(The full instructions are on tensorflow's website)

body:
Sorry @kwotsin . I don't know what those errors are about. I usually build like this:
```
  $ git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow 
  $ cd tensorflow
  $ ./configure
  $ bazel build tensorflow/tools/graph_transforms:all
```
I just tried them.
(The full instructions are on tensorflow's website)
